xwikidoc.name: SupportStrategy

xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Support Strategy
xwikidoc.content:
We have defined different support strategies, which allows us to have a global scaffolding to know what we should support or not (and thus, for example, not have to send a vote email every time a new version of a browser or a database is released).
* [[Browser Support Strategy>>BrowserSupportStrategy]]: Strategy we use to decide which browsers to support * [[Database Support Strategy>>DatabaseSupportStrategy]]: Strategy we use to decide which databases to support
